content: > this pattern is also available for > free on my blog the downloadable pdf > listed for sale contains the full > pattern in one printable file without > advertisements > > click visit pattern website to go to > the free pattern this crochet scarf uses chains to make cables it is a beginner-friendly pattern that does not use any post stitches even the popcorn stitches are fake and made using single_crochet and treble_crochet
